ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Thomas" <tigerfox@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 04, 2003 5:35 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can
you do when it does


> > Heh. Got my brewing to 184 so far. :-)
> > A couple months ago I practiced going around the trees in the zone and
got
> > it down so that by the time I got back to the starting point the fruit
> > repopped. Got lots of lots of the payala fruit.
> > Is Shar Vahl essence good for anything? I have tons of it.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> Yea, they are used to make Spiritstones with the ability of Shar Vahl
Port.
> The recipie can be found on www.eqtraders.com site at:
> http://www.eqtraders.com/items/show_item.php?item=6147
>
> Hope that helps.
>
Thanks. :-)
luv,
-Su
